info.title: Forecast API
info.description: The Forecast API lets you query for most locations on the globe, and returns: current conditions, minute-by-minute forecasts out to 1 hour (where available), hour-by-hour forecasts out to 48 hours, and more.

get.description: Get forecast for a geographical location specified by its latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Use units other than the default Imperial units in the response. Possible values are us (default), si, uk, ca

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Exclude specified data blocks from the API response. Block names should be provided as a comma-delimeted list. Allowed values are currently, minutely, hourly, daily, alerts, flags
